languages.text: "Я не смогла выказать тебе почтение, сопроводив души предателей на другую сторону. Это гложет меня, ибо я желаю служить тебе, как меч служит господину. Сделаешь ли ты меня своим щитом и тенью, Домин'{name}?"

"I could not honour you by ushering the souls of those traitors to the other side. This troubles me, for I wish to serve you as the sword serves its master. Will you make me your shield and shadow, Domin'{name}?"
languages.original_text: "Я не смогла выказать тебе почтение, сопроводив души предателей на другую сторону. Это гложет меня, ибо я желаю служить тебе, как меч служит господину. Сделаешь ли ты меня своим щитом и тенью, Домин'{name}?"

traits.locale_text: "I did not get the chance to show my respect to you by ushering the traitors' souls to the other side. This is gnawing away at me, for I wish to serve you as the sword serves its master. Will you make me your shield and your shadow, Enim'{name}?"

"I did not get the chance to show my respect to you by ushering the traitors' souls to the other side. This is gnawing away at me, for I wish to serve you as the sword serves its master. Will you make me your shield and your shadow, Enim'{name}?"

"If you will not allow me to usher the souls of these traitors to the other side, at least let me honour you through my service. I will be a weapon in your hands. I will serve you as the sword serves its master. Will you make me your shield and shadow, Enim'{name}?"

"If you will not allow me to usher the souls of these traitors to the other side, at least let me honour you through my service. I will be a weapon in your hands. I will serve you as the sword serves its master. Will you make me your shield and shadow, Enim'{name}?"

"I could not honour you by ushering the souls of those traitors to the other side. This troubles me, for I wish to serve you as the sword serves its master. Will you make me your shield and shadow, Domin'{name}?"

"I could not honour you by ushering the souls of those traitors to the other side. This troubles me, for I wish to serve you as the sword serves its master. Will you make me your shield and shadow, Domin'{name}?"

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas pu vous honorer en faisant passer les âmes de ces traîtres de l'autre côté et cela me perturbe, car je ne souhaite rien tant que vous servir comme l'épée sert son maître. Ferez-vous de moi votre bouclier et votre ombre, Domin'{name} ? »
languages.original_text: "I could not honour you by ushering the souls of those traitors to the other side. This troubles me, for I wish to serve you as the sword serves its master. Will you make me your shield and shadow, Domin'{name}?"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas pu vous honorer en faisant passer les âmes de ces traîtres de l'autre côté et cela me perturbe, car je ne souhaite rien tant que vous servir comme l'épée sert son maître. Ferez-vous de moi votre bouclier et votre ombre, Domin'{name} ? »

languages.text: «No pude honrarle enviando al otro mundo las almas de esos traidores. Esto me aflige, pues deseo servirle como la espada sirve a quien la empuña. ¿Me convertirá en su escudo y su sombra, Domin'{name}?».
languages.original_text: "I could not honour you by ushering the souls of those traitors to the other side. This troubles me, for I wish to serve you as the sword serves its master. Will you make me your shield and shadow, Domin'{name}?"

traits.locale_text: «No pude honrarle enviando al otro mundo las almas de esos traidores. Esto me aflige, pues deseo servirle como la espada sirve a quien la empuña. ¿Me convertirá en su escudo y su sombra, Domin'{name}?».

languages.text: “我没办法将那些叛徒的灵魂送往彼岸，这让我很是烦恼，因为我渴望侍奉你，就像利剑渴望侍奉它的主人一样。你愿意让我成为你的坚盾、你的影子吗，秘者{name}？”
languages.original_text: "I could not honour you by ushering the souls of those traitors to the other side. This troubles me, for I wish to serve you as the sword serves its master. Will you make me your shield and shadow, Domin'{name}?"

traits.locale_text: “我没办法将那些叛徒的灵魂送往彼岸，这让我很是烦恼，因为我渴望侍奉你，就像利剑渴望侍奉它的主人一样。你愿意让我成为你的坚盾、你的影子吗，秘者{name}？”

languages.text: 「裏切り者たちの魂をあの世に送ることで、御身に名誉を差し上げることはできません。そのことが気がかりなのです。我は剣が主人に仕えるように、御身に仕えたいと願っていたのです。我をあなたの盾、そして影にしてくださいますか、ドミン・{name}？」
languages.original_text: "I could not honour you by ushering the souls of those traitors to the other side. This troubles me, for I wish to serve you as the sword serves its master. Will you make me your shield and shadow, Domin'{name}?"

traits.locale_text: 「裏切り者たちの魂をあの世に送ることで、御身に名誉を差し上げることはできません。そのことが気がかりなのです。我は剣が主人に仕えるように、御身に仕えたいと願っていたのです。我をあなたの盾、そして影にしてくださいますか、ドミン・{name}？」

languages.text: "Ich konnte Euch keine Ehre erweisen, indem ich die Seelen dieser Verräter auf die andere Seite geleite. Das bekümmert mich, denn ich will Euch dienen, wie das Schwert seinem Meister dient. Werdet Ihr mich zu Eurem Schild und Schatten machen, Domin'{name}?"
languages.original_text: "I could not honour you by ushering the souls of those traitors to the other side. This troubles me, for I wish to serve you as the sword serves its master. Will you make me your shield and shadow, Domin'{name}?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich konnte Euch keine Ehre erweisen, indem ich die Seelen dieser Verräter auf die andere Seite geleite. Das bekümmert mich, denn ich will Euch dienen, wie das Schwert seinem Meister dient. Werdet Ihr mich zu Eurem Schild und Schatten machen, Domin'{name}?"

languages.text: "Hainlerin ruhlarını öteki tarafa götürerek seni onurlandıramam. Bu beni rahatsız ediyor. Çünkü sana tıpkı efendisine hizmet eden bir kılıç misali hizmet etmek istiyorum. Beni kalkanın ve gölgen yapacak mısın Domin'{name}?"
languages.original_text: "I could not honour you by ushering the souls of those traitors to the other side. This troubles me, for I wish to serve you as the sword serves its master. Will you make me your shield and shadow, Domin'{name}?"
